name: TDSurvival
description:
Discord server

TDSurvival is a game which merges together two different genres
Survival and tower defense. The goal of the game right now is to Survive as long as possible on current map.

Mine and gather at day, and make a maze at night, monsters will be spawning then.

Controls:

  • WASD - player movement
  • Arrow keys/middle mouse button - camera movement
  • Scroll wheel - zoom-in/out
  • Left click - placing objects
  • Right click - destroying/mining objects
  • B - show/hide Building Menu
  • E/I - show/hide inventory
  • F - enable/disable camera following the player

Gameplay instructions:

Mine iron ore to make turrets, copper to make traps, and don't block the pathway from the middle where You spawned.
Also don't block Yourself in because monsters are going to bug out that way
Make a maze with turrets on the sides, enemies can't attack them (yet)
But don't place turrets in the middle of the corridor because they also
Block the way for enemies. While traps don't block enemies.

Implemented mechanics:

  • Map generation
  • Player actions/interactions (minings, building, etc)
  • Turret-enemy interaction
  • Enemy pathfinding & player interactions (moving, attacking)
  • Inventory system

Upcoming next release V0.1.4:

  • Crafting system
  • Research system
  • Turret upgrades
  • Enemy spawning  system redone
